channel.title: ForgeCraft Server
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b][u]How to connect to ForgeCraft[/u][/b][/size]
[size=14pt][b] WE NEED STAFF [/B][/size]
Features:
[ul][li]Laid Back[/li] [li]Up 24/7[/li] [li]No white-list! All players all allowed![/li] [li]20 people max, to prevent "crowdiness"![/li] [li]Build anywhere and everywhere! (except spawn)[/li] [li]Account Password Plugin![/li][/ul]
[size=12pt] [b]Server IP: forgecraft.no-ip.biz Port: 25565 (default port)[/b] [/size]
[size=14pt] COMMANDS: [/size] [code] /spawn = teleports you to spawn point /register <password> - Set your password /login <password> - Login with your password /changepass <old> <new> - change your password [/code]

item.title: ForgeCraft Server
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin wrote:

[size=14pt]How to connect to ForgeCraft[/size]

[size=14pt] WE NEED STAFF [/size]

Features:

[ul][li]Laid Back[/li]
[li]Up 24/7[/li]
[li]No white-list! All players all allowed![/li]
[li]20 people max, to prevent “crowdiness”![/li]
[li]Build anywhere and everywhere! (except spawn)[/li]
[li]Account Password Plugin![/li][/ul]

[size=12pt]
Server IP: forgecraft.no-ip.biz
Port: 25565 (default port)
[/size]

[size=14pt]
COMMANDS:
[/size]

/spawn = teleports you to spawn point
/register <password> - Set your password
/login <password> - Login with your password
/changepass <old> <new> - change your password

Read full topic
